thread.title: 18 Hilariously Awful Pizza Delivery Fails That Will Make You Laugh Then Cry
thread.title_full: 18 Hilariously Awful Pizza Delivery Fails That Will Make You Laugh Then Cry

author: Casey Rackham
title: 18 Hilariously Awful Pizza Delivery Fails That Will Make You Laugh Then Cry
text:

i.imgur.com ID: 10742735 3. You had always wanted to go on a rollercoaster. View this embed › 
ID: 10742443 4. And you wanted to feel the wind on your face while driving down the PCH. imgur.com 
imgur.com 
  ID: 10742730 5. You wanted to sneak into a movie theater and see a double feature. View this image › 
Twitter: @nqcanadian ID: 10743868 6. And then you wanted to drink a slurpee until you got a brain freeze. View this image › 
Twitter: @Official_PCPB ID: 10743870 7. You loved dancing in the moonlight. View this embed › 
ID: 10742444 8. And you had always wanted to do the Dirty Dancing scene. View this embed › 
ID: 10742446 9. Man, did you love that Dirty Dancing scene. View this image › 
instagram.com ID: 10742507 10. Do you remember that day at your uncle’s lake house? View this image › 
Twitter: @BackInLowell ID: 10742511 11. We had never felt so free. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10742901 12. You quoted Boyhood and said, “You know how everyone’s always saying seize the moment? I don’t know, I’m kinda thinking it’s the other way around. You know, like the moment seizes us.” View this image › 
ID: 10743968 13. One day we were going to pack up our bags and move to Montana. View this image › 
instagram.com ID: 10742841 14. We didn’t know why we picked Montana — we just did. Twitter: @ambiguousVic 
  ID: 10743867 15. We were going to spend our days on a porch and play checkers. View this embed › 
ID: 10742907 16. And on Sundays we’d make fresh-squeezed lemonade. View this image › 
Twitter: @leeleereed ID: 10743887 17. But now it’s too late for all of that. View this image › 
Twitter: @LauraJayneTee ID: 10743879 18. R.I.P., sweet pizza. R.I.P. View this image ›
